testsuite.name: cl.price.core.adapters.controllers.PriceControllerTest

testcase.name: When PriceControllerTest is called queryPrice should return a not found exception
When PriceControllerTest is called queryPrice should return a bad request for missing header
When PriceControllerTest is called queryPrice should return a response ok with a product
When PriceControllerTest is called queryPrice should return a not found exception
When PriceControllerTest is called queryPrice should return a bad request for missing header
